column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
column14: Arrived with seal removed and lint stuck to lipstick, the surface has that used looking texture. With all the Covid-19 concerns to get opened lipstick and used is unacceptable and gross.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2021
column14: This lip balm is pretty in the tube, looks like an opal. The color turns into an unflattering neon highlighter hot pink on my lips. It doesn't really stain your lips evenly it sort of sits on top of your skin. The formula is a bit drying,waxy and has an odd scent. The sparkles do stick to your lips in an akward way which I dont really care for. I will just use this as a display because I have ph lipbalms that work alot better with less of the cons

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2021
column14: Although it is super pretty to look at, it dries my lips out and tastes bad. You also get almost no sparkles on your lips. It's like dollar store children's quality. Very disappointed.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2021
column14: I am a sucker for color changing lipsticks. This essence glimmer glow looks beautiful. I was really excited to try it. It’s very dry. It doesn’t feel like a lipstick at all. It feels like I have nothing on but it’s drying at the same time if that makes sense. The color is a very sheer neon pink which is not very pretty. Also true huge glitter flakes look pretty but are annoying when one comes off on your lip and  you have to pick it off. This is a no for me. Save your 4$, that will buy you two la colors mood glosses at 2$ each in store and they’re moisturizing and an amazing shade of pink

column6: It's only 4 dollars, less expensive than a good lip balm! Lovely!
column9: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2021
column14: I love this, just a little shimmer, sheer, looks great with my hair, not drying, soft and moisturizing.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
column14: The lipstick feels more like a gloss....which I like. It's pretty, lightweight, and gives your lips a pretty pink color if you like pink. But the plastic was completely smashed on delivery

column9: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2022
column14: It's OK. It does what it says it does. But I'm not a fan. It feels more like a ChapStick... With a Pink stain in it. Price is unbeatable. I also think it looks different on different kind of lips, meaning...lip color, skin color and so on. Not a bad product at all just not for me.
